name: spotify-playlist-manager
description: Spotify Playlist Manager with brand-based playlist creation

scripts.heroku-prebuild: bash -c 'echo === PREBUILD START === && pwd && ls -la && if [ -d "frontend" ]; then cd frontend && npm install && echo === FRONTEND DEPENDENCIES INSTALLED ===; else echo ERROR: frontend directory not found && exit 1; fi'
scripts.heroku-postbuild: bash -c 'echo === POSTBUILD START === && export NODE_ENV=production && pwd && ROOT_DIR=$(pwd) && cd frontend && npm run build && if [ ! -d "build" ]; then echo ERROR: Build failed - no build directory && exit 1; fi && echo === BUILD COMPLETED === && ls -la build/ && echo === COPYING FILES === && mkdir -p "$ROOT_DIR/backend/static" && rm -rf "$ROOT_DIR/backend/static"/* && cp -rv build/* "$ROOT_DIR/backend/static/" && echo === COPY COMPLETED === && if [ ! -f "$ROOT_DIR/backend/static/index.html" ]; then echo ERROR: index.html not found in static directory && exit 1; fi && ls -la "$ROOT_DIR/backend/static/"'
scripts.start: bash -c 'echo === STARTING SERVER === && cd backend && STATIC_DIR=/app/backend/static PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:. gunicorn main:app --workers 4 --worker-class uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker --bind 0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8000} --timeout 120 --access-logfile - --error-logfile - --log-level info'
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && uvicorn main:app --reload" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: bash -c 'echo === LOCAL BUILD START === && cd frontend && npm run build && echo === LOCAL BUILD COMPLETE === && cd .. && mkdir -p backend/static && cp -r frontend/build/* backend/static/ && echo === FILES COPIED TO STATIC ==='
scripts.verify-static: bash -c 'echo === VERIFYING STATIC FILES === && ls -la backend/static/ && if [ -f "backend/static/index.html" ]; then echo SUCCESS: index.html found; else echo ERROR: index.html not found; fi'

author: Session42
